1. Microsoft to roll out new autonomous AI agents next month, fending off challenge from Salesforce  CNBC

item.title: TikTok owner ByteDance sacks intern for sabotaging AI project - BBC.com
item.description:
1. TikTok owner ByteDance sacks intern for sabotaging AI project  BBC.com
  2. The company that owns TikTok just fired an intern who 'maliciously interfered' with its AI—and caused $10 million in damages  Fortune
  3. TikTok owner sacks intern for allegedly sabotaging AI project  The Guardian
  4. Still cringing about your first internship? At least you didn't try to sabotage an AI project from one of China's biggest tech firms  PC Gamer
  5. Intern allegedly messed with ByteDance's LLM training cluster  The Register

item.title: Perplexity AI seeks valuation of about $9 billion in new funding round - CNBC
item.description:
